caption.p: (A) Linear mixed model showing effects of TFT treatment and generation on mean offspring number; and (B) generalized linear mixed model of effects of TFT treatment on TFT haplotype frequency of populations with fluctuating population size (Experiment 2). When reanalyzing mean offspring number (A), having excluded the 15 zero values in the dataset resulting from three vial extinctions (two from the TFT 0% treatment, and one from the TFT 50% treatment), the effect of TFT treatment on offspring number remained statistically non-significant (χ2=3.2, p=0.36). The binomial model of TFT frequency (b) indicated overdispersion (overdispersion parameter = 1.85), and thus an observation-level random effect was added (experimental population) to the model (overdispersion parameter of final model = 1.07).
